name: knex
description: A batteries-included SQL query & schema builder for Postgres, MySQL and SQLite3 and the Browser

scripts.test: npm run babel && npm run jshint && istanbul --config=test/.istanbul.yml cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --check-leaks -t 5000 -b -R spec test/index.js && npm run tape
scripts.plaintest: mocha --check-leaks -t 10000 -b -R spec test/index.js && npm run tape
